promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical dragonfly dark-type pokemon with dark wings. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptonoir, a a chibi cute mythical dragonfly dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Edge, Dark Hole. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "dark" or "Cryptonoir". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: A miniature shadow nymph, Cryptonoir thrives in tomb-like enclaves. Using Dark Edge to fight and Dark Hole to hide, it dances quietly in the darkness.
